snippet: The rap artist Notorious B.I.G. was killed by a single bullet that pierced several vital organs in a 1997 drive-by shooting, a long-sealed autopsy report released on Friday shows.
abstract: Long-sealed autopsy report relating to death of rap artist Christopher G Wallace, aka Notorious B I G, is released; report shows he was killed by single bullet that pierced several vital organs in 1997 drive-by shooting.
lead_paragraph: The rap artist Notorious B.I.G. was killed by a single bullet that pierced several vital organs in a 1997 drive-by shooting, a long-sealed autopsy report released on Friday shows.

headline.main: California: Autopsy Released in Killing of Notorious B.I.G.
headline.print_headline: California: Autopsy Released In Killing of Notorious B.I.G.
